translation.zh: - 再见   - 再见

translation.en: -♪ Goodbye ♪ -♪ Goodbye ♪
translation.zh: - 再见   - 再见

translation.en: [Jacob] Ebenezer?
translation.zh: 埃比尼泽 ？

translation.en: Some assistance, please.
translation.zh: 过来 帮帮忙

translation.en: Yes, Jacob, coming.
translation.zh: 好的   雅 各 布   来 了

translation.en: Later, Isabel.
translation.zh: 伊莎贝尔   以后 再说

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不 ！

translation.en: There is no "later!"
translation.zh: 不 会 再有 “ 以后 ” 了 ！

translation.en: Goodbye, Ebenezer.
translation.zh: 再见   埃比尼泽

translation.en: [Past] Oh, look. A wee glimpse into Isabel's future.
translation.zh: 快 看   我们 可以 一 窥 伊莎贝尔 的 未来

translation.en: Oh, she looks so happy.
translation.zh: 她 看起来 好 开心

translation.en: And her husband's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 她 丈夫 也 帅气

translation.en: That… That could have been you, I suppose. Oh, too bad, Scrooge. Too bad.
translation.zh: 本来 可能 应该 是 你 的   太 可惜 了   斯克鲁奇

translation.en: Why show me all of this now? What's done is done. I can't go back.
translation.zh: 为什么 现在 要 给 我 看 这些 ？   覆水难收   我 已经 回 不 去 了

translation.en: When we were financially secure, I would have married her…
translation.zh: 当初 经济 若 有 保障   我 最终 一定 会 …

translation.en: eventually.
translation.zh: 娶 她

translation.en: Wouldn't I?
translation.zh: 不是 吗 ？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我 不 知道

translation.en: -[Scrooge yells] -Bye!
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Take me back.
translation.zh: 带 我 回去 啊

translation.en: Take me back!
translation.zh: 带 我 回去 ！

translation.en: I'm afraid I can't.
translation.zh: 恐怕 我 爱莫能助

translation.en: There is no going back, nor changing what has been.
translation.zh: 世上 没有 回头路   也 无法 改变 过去

translation.en: You said so yourself.
translation.zh: 你 自己 也 这么 说

translation.en: You can't change the past, but you can learn from it.
translation.zh: 你 不 能 改变 过去   但 你 可以 从中 学习

translation.en: For your own sake, I hope you do, Scrooge.
translation.zh: 斯克鲁奇   为了 你 自己   但愿 你 能 吸取 教训

translation.en: -Ooh. -[Scrooge] No, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 不要 啊 ！

translation.en: Whoo! It really is time to go.
translation.zh: 我 真的 该 走 了

translation.en: Farewell, Scrooge.
translation.zh: 再见 了   斯克鲁奇

translation.en: Farewell. [laughs]
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: No, please! Don't leave me here!
translation.zh: 不要   求 你 了 ！ 别 把 我 留在 这里 ！

translation.en: I must.
translation.zh: 我 必须 这么 做

translation.en: Ooh. I have shown you what was.
translation.zh: 我 已经 为 你 展示 了 过去

translation.en: Now another will show you what is.
translation.zh: 现在   另 一 位 将 为 你 展示 现在

translation.en: Remember what you have seen, Scrooge.
translation.zh: 铭记 你 所 看到 的   斯克鲁奇

translation.en: Remember. Learn.
translation.zh: 铭记   吸取 教训

translation.en: Change while you still can!
translation.zh: 你 还有 机会 改变

translation.en: [Jacob] The second, at 2:00.
translation.zh: 第二 位   两点

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂 ？

translation.en: Is there anybody there?
translation.zh: 有人 吗 ？

translation.en: [Scrooge] Strange, annoying, candle lady thing?
translation.zh: 古怪 烦人 的 蜡烛 女士 ？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 喂 ？

translation.en: Huh?
translation.zh: 哈 ？

translation.en: Who dares disturb my slumber?
translation.zh: 是 谁 胆敢 打搅 我 睡觉 ？

translation.en: State thy name and business, puny mortal.
translation.zh: 凡间 小民   快报 上 名 来   所 来 何事

translation.en: [laughs] I can't…
translation.zh: 不行 …

translation.en: I can't… I can't keep it up.
translation.zh: 我 装 不 下去 了

translation.en: I'm sorry, I'm sorry. -It was her. She dared me. -[cheerling laughs]
translation.zh: 对不住   都 赖 她   是 她 激 我 的

translation.en: Oh, we do like to have fun here.
translation.zh: 我们 喜欢 在 这里 找 点 乐子

translation.en: Don't worry.
translation.zh: 别 担心

translation.en: I know who you are.
translation.zh: 我 知道 你 是 谁

translation.en: Come on, bring it in, Ebenezer Scrooge. Bring it in!
translation.zh: 来 嘛   埃比 尼泽斯克鲁奇   抱 一个 ！

translation.en: -[Scrooge groans] -Welcome, my friend. Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎 你   我 的 朋友

translation.en: Welcome where?
translation.zh: 欢迎 什么 呀 ？

translation.en: Where am I?
translation.zh: 我 在 什么 地方 ？

translation.en: When am I?
translation.zh: 这是 何年 何月 ？

translation.en: Oh, you are in the here and now. In the present!
translation.zh: 你 在 此时 此地   就 在 当下 ！

translation.en: Isn't it just fabulous?
translation.zh: 是 不是 很 棒 ？

translation.en: It's fine, I suppose.
translation.zh: 还 行 吧

translation.en: From here, I can go anywhere I please.
translation.zh: 从 这里   我 想 去 哪里 都 可以

translation.en: Just so long as it's happening right now.
translation.zh: 只要 是 当下 就 行

translation.en: And I do so love to visit
translation.zh: 而且   这个 时节

translation.en: your teeny-tiny, tootsy-wootsy, little planet at this time of year.
translation.zh: 我 特别 喜欢 去   你们 那个 不丁点 的 小 星球

translation.en: So much love, generosity, and good cheer!
translation.zh: 大家 相亲 相爱   四处 欢欢喜喜 ！

translation.en: Which, conversely, brings me to you.
translation.zh: 这 倒 把 我 带到 你 面前

translation.en: -Me? -Yes, you.
translation.zh: - 我 ？   - 对   就是 你

translation.en: Squeezing, wrenching, grasping, clutching, covetous you!
translation.zh: 小小 气气   唧唧歪歪   别别扭扭   咋咋唬唬   铁公 鸡外 加磁 凤凰 的 你 ！

translation.en: Secret and solitary as an oyster, you edge along the crowded paths of life
translation.zh: 你 像 牡蛎 一样   隐秘 又 孤单   侧身 行于 这 熙攘 嘈杂 的 人世间

translation.en: keeping everyone at a distance.
translation.zh: 离 所有人 都 远远 的

translation.en: Why, you stopped truly living your life so long ago, you might as well be dead.
translation.zh: 你 过 得 早就 不是 日子 了   简直 与 行尸走肉 无异

translation.en: Do not presume to tell me how to live my life.
translation.zh: 请 不要 擅自 评判 我 的 生活

translation.en: I lead a good life.
translation.zh: 我 过 得 很 好

translation.en: I'm a good man. [grunts]
translation.zh: 我 是 好人

translation.en: [Present] Ha! "A good man," he says.
translation.zh: 他 说 “ 好人 ”

translation.en: [rapping] ♪ Ebenezer Scrooge ♪
translation.zh: 埃比 尼泽斯克鲁奇

translation.en: ♪ The sins of man are huge ♪
translation.zh: 人类 都 是 罪大恶极

translation.en: ♪ A never-ending symphony Of villainy and infamy ♪
translation.zh: 一 部 永无止境 的 交响   充斥 着 罪 与 恶

translation.en: ♪ Of mischief, mayhem, misery Deceit and subterfuge ♪
translation.zh: 灾祸   混乱   痛苦   欺骗   诡计

translation.en: ♪ And no one's worse than you Mr. Ebenezer Scrooge ♪
translation.zh: 你 更 是 其中 的 佼佼者   埃比 尼泽斯克鲁奇

translation.en: ♪ But while the likes of you Make life seem like a living hell ♪
translation.zh: 虽然 像 你 这样 的 人 将 世间 变 炼狱

translation.en: ♪ You know, life has A brighter side as well, whoo! ♪
translation.zh: 你 要 知道   人生 还有 光明 的 一隅

translation.en: [singing] ♪ I like life, life likes me ♪
translation.zh: 我 爱 生活   生活 爱 我

translation.en: ♪ Life and I fairly fully agree ♪
translation.zh: 生活 与 我 琴 瑟相 和

translation.en: ♪ Life is fine, life is good ♪
translation.zh: 生活 美   生活 好

translation.en: ♪ Especially mine Which is just as it should be ♪
translation.zh: 尤其 我 的 生活   简直 没 话说

translation.en: ♪ I like life, here and now ♪
translation.zh: 我 爱 生活   就 在 此时 与 此地

translation.en: ♪ Life and I made a mutual vow ♪
translation.zh: 生活 与 我 把 誓约 定立

translation.en: ♪ Till I die, life and I ♪
translation.zh: 只要 在 世一日   生活 与 我

translation.en: ♪ We'll both try to be better somehow ♪
translation.zh: 会 努力 做到 更 好   谁 也 不 放弃

translation.en: ♪ Yes, I like living the life And why not? ♪
translation.zh: 是的   我 热爱 生活   何乐而不为 ？

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause life's a pleasure ♪
translation.zh: 因为 生活 是 一 种 享受

translation.en: ♪ That I deny not ♪
translation.zh: 对此 我 直言不讳

translation.en: ♪ I like life ♪ Whoo! ♪ Life likes me ♪
translation.zh: 我 爱 生活   生活 爱 我

translation.en: ♪ I make life a perpetual spree ♪
translation.zh: 我 将 生活 变狂 欢   永远 快活

translation.en: ♪ Eating food, drinking wine ♪
translation.zh: 美食 缤纷   豪饮 畅快

translation.en: ♪ Thinking who'd like The privilege to join me ♪
translation.zh: 有 谁 想 与 我 举杯 共 开怀

translation.en: ♪ I like life, you should too ♪
translation.zh: 我 爱 生活   你 也 该 这样 做

translation.en: ♪ Just live life Spreading cheer while you do ♪
translation.zh: 快意 人生   同时 将 快乐 散播

translation.en: ♪ Life is short, make it count ♪
translation.zh: 人生 苦 短   莫要 虚度

translation.en: ♪ There's no problem That can't be surmounted ♪
translation.zh: 没有 困难 无法 克服

translation.en: ♪ Live your life unafraid ♪
translation.zh: 享受 人生   不要 害怕

translation.en: ♪ Just give in ♪
translation.zh: 只管 放手

translation.en: ♪ ‘Cause life's a wonderful thing ♪
translation.zh: 因为 生活 多么 精彩

translation.en: ♪ For living ♪
translation.zh: 应该 纵情 畅游

translation.en: ♪ Life ♪
translation.zh: 生活

translation.en: ♪ Oh, yes, I like ♪
translation.zh: 对   我 爱

translation.en: ♪ Life! ♪
translation.zh: 生活 ！

translation.en: Do you see the light?
translation.zh: 你 看到 光明 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Can you feel it, Scrooge?
translation.zh: 你 感受 到 了 吗   斯克鲁奇 ？

translation.en: Are you ready to live your life, now, in the present,
translation.zh: 准备 好活 在 当下

translation.en: unencumbered by the weight of the past?
translation.zh: 放下 过去 的 重担 了 吗 ？

translation.en: I'm ready.
translation.zh: 我 准备 好 了

translation.en: I'm ready to go home. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 我 准备 好 回家 了   非常 感谢

translation.en: Oh, really?
translation.zh: 哦   真的 吗 ？

translation.en: But the fireworks. We did a whole song and everything.
translation.zh: 可 还有 烟火 呢   咱们 又 唱 又 跳 的

translation.en: Well, I'm not giving up on you yet, Ebenezer Scrooge.
translation.zh: 我 还 没 放弃 你   埃比 尼泽斯克鲁奇

translation.en: Come on. Let's hit the town.
translation.zh: 来 吧   咱们 进城 逛逛

translation.en: Hit the town? I'll hit something else in a minute.
translation.zh: 进城 逛逛 ？ 我 马上 要 撞 破头 了

translation.en: Dragged from pillar to post in the middle of the night. Huh.
translation.zh: 大半夜 被 拎 着 四处 跑 的

translation.en: My friends, please. I-I would like to propose a toast.
translation.zh: 朋友们   我 想 提议 祝酒

translation.en: My friends, please. Oh--
translation.zh: 朋友们   请 听 我 说   哦 …

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 哦   谢谢

translation.en: He really is a buffoon, that boy.
translation.zh: 这 小子 还 真 能 作怪

translation.en: There's no need to whisper.
translation.zh: 没 必要 说 悄悄话

translation.en: No one can hear or see you.
translation.zh: 没有 人 能 听到 或 看见 你

translation.en: -[Scrooge gasps] -Lucky them. [laughs]
translation.zh: 算 他们 走运

translation.en: Please raise your glass and drink to the good health and long life
translation.zh: 请 各位 举杯   将 健康 长寿 的 美好 祝愿

translation.en: of my celebrated uncle, Ebenezer Scrooge.
translation.zh: 送给 我 的 舅舅 埃比尼泽斯克鲁奇

translation.en: -[crowd mutter] -[woman] Boo.
translation.zh: 切

translation.en: I know. I know.
translation.zh: 我 知道

translation.en: But I like old Scrooge.
translation.zh: 但 我 喜欢斯克鲁奇 老头

translation.en: -No, no, no. No. Come now. I do. I do. -[woman] Why?
translation.zh: 别 这样   我 是 很 喜欢 他

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么 ？

translation.en: I never met my mother, but my father spoke of her often.
translation.zh: 我 没 见 过 我 妈妈   但 我 爸爸 经常 说起 她

translation.en: Of her kindness. Her generosity.
translation.zh: 说 她 善良 慷慨

translation.en: It's hard to believe that the woman he described
translation.zh: 很 难 想象   他 口中 的 这位 女子

translation.en: was that old stick-in-the-mud's little sister. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 会 是 这个 无趣 老头 的 妹妹

translation.en: But his sister she was.
translation.zh: 但 的确 如此

translation.en: And, by all accounts, she and my uncle were inseparable.
translation.zh: 而且   大家 都 说   妈妈 和 舅舅 亲密 无间

translation.en: She loved him without reservation, and he, her.
translation.zh: 她 毫无 保留地 爱 舅舅   而 舅舅 也 是 如此

translation.en: So he can't be all bad.
translation.zh: 所以 他 应该 也 没 那么 坏

translation.en: I have to believe that somewhere in that loathsome old carcass of his,
translation.zh: 我 必须 相信   在 那 具 老朽 的 躯壳 之中

translation.en: the man my mother loved is fighting to get out.
translation.zh: 妈妈 所 爱 的 那个 人 依然 在 努力 挣脱

translation.en: I should like to meet him one day.
translation.zh: 希望 有朝一日   我 能 见到 那个 人

translation.en: Which brings me to my next toast of the evening, to my beloved mother.
translation.zh: 说到 这里   今晚 我 要 将 下 一 杯   敬 我 亲爱 的 妈妈

translation.en: As I entered the world, you departed.
translation.zh: 在 我 降生 之 时   你 却 离开 了

translation.en: Here's to the Christmases we never shared, and the sad, short one we did.
translation.zh: 敬 我们 未能 共度 的 佳节   敬 我们 短暂 共度 的 那个 圣诞

translation.en: Harry, my dear, sweet Harry,
translation.zh: 哈利   亲爱 的

translation.en: let's not dwell on the sadness in our past,
translation.zh: 我们 不要 沉湎于 过去 的 悲伤

translation.en: on those who cannot be with us.
translation.zh: 别 总 去 想 那些 无法 与 我们 一起

translation.en: -Or refuse to be. -[cheerling squeaks]
translation.zh: 或 不 愿 与 我们 一起 的 人

translation.en: Instead, let us celebrate those who are here.
translation.zh: 而是 珍惜 眼前 的 大家

translation.en: Hear! Hear!
translation.zh: 说 得 好 ！

translation.en: Everyone, let us honor the past by toasting our present.
translation.zh: 各位   让 我们 纪念 过去   为 当下 干杯

translation.en: To each other. To Christmas.
translation.zh: 敬 彼此   敬圣 诞

translation.en: -To friendship. -[man 1] Hear! Hear!
translation.zh: - 敬友 谊   - 说 得 好 ！

translation.en: -[man 2] To friendship. -To friendship.
translation.zh: - 敬友 谊   - 敬友 谊

translation.en: Oh, for goodness' sake, where are we going now?
translation.zh: 老天爷   这 又 是 要 去 哪里 啊 ？

translation.en: [Present] May I present to you the beautiful home of Robert Cratchit Esquire.
translation.zh: 容 我 为 你 展示   罗伯特克拉奇 先生 温馨 的 家

translation.en: He owes these sumptuous surroundings to the generosity of his employer.
translation.zh: 他 把 这些 豪华 陈设   都 归功于 他 老板 的 慷慨

translation.en: I never knew Cratchit had quite so many children.
translation.zh: 我 都 不 知道 克拉奇 有 这么 多 孩子

translation.en: No? Did you ever ask him?
translation.zh: 是 吗 ？ 你 问 过 他 吗 ？

translation.en: Mmm. Pure nectar. An elixir fit for Father Christmas himself.
translation.zh: 真是 玉露 琼浆   圣诞 老人 喝 了 都 会长 命百 岁

translation.en: The stuffing's ready, Father.
translation.zh: 馅料 填 好 了   爸爸

translation.en: -[both] And the birdie is plucked. -Tremendous work, my dears.
translation.zh: - 毛 也 拔 干净 了   - 毛 也 拔 干净 了   干 得 漂亮   亲爱 的

translation.en: Roast goose with sage and onion stuffing à la Cratchit.
translation.zh: 克拉奇式 填料 烤鹅   配鼠 尾草 和 洋葱

translation.en: A legendary gourmet dish.
translation.zh: 传说 中 的 人间 美味

translation.en: There's one problem. I'm not sure whether to stuff the goose with the stuffing,
translation.zh: 只有 一个 问题   我 不 确定 是 用料 填鹅

translation.en: or stuff the stuffing with the goose.
translation.zh: 还是 用鹅 填料

translation.en: Come now, my love.
translation.zh: 好 了   亲爱 的

translation.en: It is a lean Christmas, there's no denying that.
translation.zh: 的确   今年 圣诞 是 有些 寒酸

translation.en: But we have each other and we have the children.
translation.zh: 但 我们 还有 彼此   有 孩子们

translation.en: We can still make the most of it.
translation.zh: 苦 中 依然 可以 作乐 啊

translation.en: In fact, I do believe this will be the best Cratchit Christmas ever.
translation.zh: 还 别 说   我 觉得 今年   是 克拉奇家 最 精彩 的 圣诞

translation.en: [children] Hooray!
translation.zh: 万岁 ！

translation.en: Not another toast.
translation.zh: 又 要 敬酒 啊

translation.en: If you please, a toast to those whose generosity
translation.zh: 请容 我 敬慷慨 之 人 一 杯

translation.en: have made possible tomorrow's sumptuous Christmas feast.
translation.zh: 多亏 了 他们   才 有 我们 明天 丰盛 的 圣诞 大餐

translation.en: Master Timothy and Miss Katherine,
translation.zh: 我 说 的 当然 就是 克拉奇家

translation.en: the Christmas-caroling Cratchits, of course.
translation.zh: 圣诞 颂歌 二重唱   蒂莫西少爷 和 凯瑟琳 小姐

translation.en: And Mr. Ebenezer Scrooge.
translation.zh: 还有 埃比 尼泽斯克鲁奇 先生

translation.en: Oh! Scrooge?
translation.zh: 斯克鲁奇 ？

translation.en: What are you trying to do, spoil our Christmas?
translation.zh: 你 这是 干嘛   大过节 找 不 痛快 吗 ？

translation.en: But his money paid for the goose, my dear. No, your money paid for the goose.
translation.zh: - 是 他 给 了 我们 买鹅 的 钱 啊   - 不   买鹅 的 钱 是 你 赚 来 的

translation.en: -If you can even call that a goose. -But he paid me the money.
translation.zh: - 亏得 那 东西 也 算鹅   - 但 钱 是 他 付 我 的

translation.en: Because you earned it.
translation.zh: 那 是 你 应得 的

translation.en: Believe me, you earned that money, Bob.
translation.zh: 相信 我   鲍勃   那 钱 是 你 应得 的

translation.en: Mr. Scrooge assures me that times are hard, my dear.
translation.zh: 亲爱 的   斯克鲁奇 先生 说 了   现在 世道 艰难

translation.en: Times are hard. For us, not him.
translation.zh: 对 我们 来说 世道 艰难   对 他 可不 是

translation.en: Nonetheless, he is the founder of our feast, and we should drink to him.
translation.zh: 不管 怎么 说   因为 有 他   我们 才能 美餐 一 顿   应该 敬 他 一 杯

translation.en: Hear! Hear!
translation.zh: 说 得 好 ！

translation.en: The founder of our feast indeed.
translation.zh: 因为 有 他   我们 才能 美餐 一 顿   才 怪

translation.en: I'd like to give him something to feast on.
translation.zh: 我 倒 想 让 他 尝些 滋味

translation.en: He'd have indigestion all January.
translation.zh: 让 他 整个 一月份 都 消化 不良

translation.en: [sighs] Children, we shall drink to your father.
translation.zh: 孩子   大家 应为 你们 的 爸爸 举杯

translation.en: For the love and happiness he brings us.
translation.zh: 感谢 他 带给 我们 爱 与 幸福

translation.en: And to our Tiny Tim, for the health we wish him.
translation.zh: 也 祝 我们 的 小蒂姆 健康

translation.en: And, for the sake of your dear father,
translation.zh: 看 在 你们 亲爱 的 爸爸 份 上

translation.en: I will even drink to that old miser, Mr. Scrooge.
translation.zh: 我 甚至 甘愿 祝 那 老吝 啬鬼斯克鲁奇

translation.en: Long life to him and to us all.
translation.zh: 祝 他   祝 我们 大家 长命百岁

translation.en: And a merry Christmas to us all.
translation.zh: 祝 我们 大家 圣诞 快乐

translation.en: [children] Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞 快乐 ！

translation.en: God bless us.
translation.zh: 上帝 保佑 我们

translation.en: God bless us, every one.
translation.zh: 上帝 保佑 我们 大家

translation.en: [children] Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞 快乐 ！

translation.en: I think Bob Cratchit's rather fond of me.
translation.zh: 我 觉得 鲍勃克拉奇 很 喜欢 我

translation.en: So is his wife. Couldn't you tell? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他 妻子 也 是   你 看 不 出来 吗 ？

translation.en: And now, to the triumphant musical climax of this celebration.
translation.zh: 接下来   到 本次 庆典 精彩 的 音乐 高潮

translation.en: Master Timothy, Miss Katherine, would you be so kind?
translation.zh: 蒂莫西少 爷   凯瑟琳 小姐   二 位 可否 赏光 ？

translation.en: -No. -[children] Sing, sing!
translation.zh: - 不   - 唱 一 曲 ！

translation.en: Go on, love. Sing, sing!
translation.zh: - 来 吧   亲爱 的   唱 一 曲 ！   - 唱 一 曲 ！

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 好 难为情

translation.en: Sing!
translation.zh: 唱 嘛 ！

translation.en: I will if Kathy does.
translation.zh: 凯西 唱   我 就 唱

translation.en: ♪ On the beautiful day That I dream about ♪
translation.zh: 在 我 梦 中 那 美好 的 一日

translation.en: ♪ There's a world I would love to see ♪
translation.zh: 有 我 想 看到 的 天地

translation.en: ♪ It's a beautiful place Where the sun comes out ♪
translation.zh: 那里 风景如画   金日如炽

translation.en: ♪ And it shines in the sky for me ♪
translation.zh: 为 我 照耀 天际

translation.en: ♪ On this beautiful day That I dream about ♪
translation.zh: 在 我 梦 中 那 美好 的 一日

translation.en: ♪ There's no place I would rather be ♪
translation.zh: 我 哪里 都 不 想 去

translation.en: ♪ On this beautiful winter's morning ♪
translation.zh: 在 这个 美丽 的 冬天 清晨

translation.en: ♪ If my wish could come true somehow ♪
translation.zh: 如果 我 的 愿望 能 得以 实现

translation.en: ♪ Then the beautiful day That I dream about ♪
translation.zh: 那 我 梦 中 美好 的 一日

translation.en: ♪ Would be here ♪
translation.zh: 就 会 马上

translation.en: ♪ And now ♪
translation.zh: 来到 我们 身边

translation.en: Timmy.
translation.zh: 蒂米

translation.en: Oh, just breathe. Slowly. That's it.
translation.zh: 深 呼吸

translation.en: Oh, just breathe. Slowly. That's it. -That's it. -[Tim coughs]
translation.zh: 慢点   就 这样

translation.en: Slowly.
translation.zh: 慢慢来

translation.en: Bob's boy, Tim.
translation.zh: 鲍勃 的 儿子   蒂姆

translation.en: What will become of him?
translation.zh: 他 以后 会 怎样 ？

translation.en: The future is as much a mystery to me as it is to you.
translation.zh: 对 你 我 来说   未来 都 是 一个 迷

translation.en: I can only show you what is.
translation.zh: 我 只能 让 你 看到 现在

translation.en: What's to come if you do not change?
translation.zh: 如果 你 不 改变   日后 会 怎样 ？

translation.en: Well, that will soon be revealed by… someone else.
translation.zh: 很快 会 有 另 一 位 为 你 揭示

translation.en: [burps] Oh, excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Look, friend, there really is no great secret to any of this.
translation.zh: 听 着   朋友   这 里面 可 没 什么 大 秘密

translation.en: You just have to do the best you can with the time you have.
translation.zh: 你 只 需要 抓住 时机   尽力而为

translation.en: But you better get started soon.
translation.zh: 但 你 最好 赶紧 开始

translation.en: Because before you know it, all that time you think you have
translation.zh: 你 以为 自己 还有 时间   可 一不小心

translation.en: will run out.
translation.zh: 它们 就 会 溜走

translation.en: [Jacob] The third, at 3:00.
translation.zh: 第三 位   三点

translation.en: Well, goodbye, Ebenezer Scroo…
translation.zh: 好 了

translation.en: Well, goodbye, Ebenezer Scroo… Ooh! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 再见   埃比尼泽斯 克鲁 …

translation.en: Would you look at that?
translation.zh: 你 瞅瞅

translation.en: -[Prudence whimpers] -I, uh…
translation.zh: 我 …

translation.en: We are no longer in the present.
translation.zh: 我们 已经 离开 现在 了

translation.en: This is the future.
translation.zh: 这里 是 未来

translation.en: This is what is yet to come.
translation.zh: 这是 还 没 发生 的 事

translation.en: Are you still in there, giant?
translation.zh: 你 还 在 吗   巨人 ？

translation.en: The fellow in the green robes? Liked life and so forth?
translation.zh: 穿 绿袍子 的 人 ？ 爱 生活 什么的 ？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: You are something else entirely.
translation.zh: 你 跟 他 可 完全 不 一样

translation.en: You don't speak?
translation.zh: 你 不 说话 吗 ？

translation.en: Your colleagues were rather fond of speaking.
translation.zh: 你 的 同事们 话 都 可 多 了

translation.en: More than I would have liked.
translation.zh: 多 到 招人 烦

translation.en: So you are the one that will show me what awaits if I do not change my ways.
translation.zh: 所以 你 想 让 我 看看   如果 我 不 改变   将 会 有 何种 后果

translation.en: Yes?
translation.zh: 对 吧 ？

translation.en: So I should change, should I?
translation.zh: 所以   我 应该 改变   对 吧 ？

translation.en: Why? Tell me.
translation.zh: 为什么 ？ 说 啊

translation.en: I live my life as well as I can.
translation.zh: 我 一直 在 努力 生活

translation.en: I have my faults, but who does not, truly?
translation.zh: 我 是 有 缺点   但 人 非圣贤   不是 吗 ？

translation.en: Are all others I've been shown this night without blame?
translation.zh: 莫非 今晚 我 看到 的   其他人 就 没有 半 点错 ？

translation.en: Am I the only one with the power to change my life?
translation.zh: 莫非 就 我 一个 有 能力 改变 自己 ？

translation.en: To change the lives of others?
translation.zh: 改变 别人 的 生活 ？

translation.en: Well? Am I?
translation.zh: 嗯 ？   是 吗 ？

translation.en: Tell me!
translation.zh: 说 啊 ！

translation.en: Oh, very well.
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: Lead on.
translation.zh: 带路 吧

translation.en: Show me what bleak future my wickedness has wrought.
translation.zh: 让 我 看看 自己 的 邪恶   酿成 了 怎样 凄惨 的 未来

translation.en: And, yes, nobody can see or hear me, I know.
translation.zh: 我 知道   没 人 能 看见 或 听见 我

translation.en: [Tom Jenkins] Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们

translation.en: good morning to you on this joyous Christmas Day.
translation.zh: 在 这个 欢喜 的 圣诞节   祝 各位 早上 好

translation.en: We are gathered here as a group, united by a common bond.
translation.zh: 我们 因 共同 的 牵绊 而 聚集一堂

translation.en: Namely, our feelings of gratitude
translation.zh: 那 就是   我们 都 感激

translation.en: to Mr. Ebenezer Scrooge.
translation.zh: 埃比尼泽斯克鲁奇 先生

translation.en: -[crowd cheer] -I know that fellow.
translation.zh: 我 认识 那个 人

translation.en: Jenkins. Owes me 25… No, 50 pounds.
translation.zh: 詹金斯   他 欠 我 25 … 不对   是 50 英镑

translation.en: I must say he looks uncommonly happy for a man so deep in debt.
translation.zh: 不得不 说   他 债务 缠身   还 这么 欢快   可 真是 难得

translation.en: In fact, most of this rabble owes me money. Shush. Shush.
translation.zh: 事实上   这些 人中 多数 都 欠 我 的 钱

translation.en: While we are all deeply moved,
translation.zh: 大家 都 很 动容

translation.en: those of us who Mr. S was so kind as to lend money to over the years
translation.zh: 我们 这些 多年 来   跟 这位 好心 先生 借 钱 受助 的 人

translation.en: are particularly grateful for what he has done for us today.
translation.zh: 尤其 为 他 今天 的 善行 感恩

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -What have I done? Certainly not forgiven their debts.
translation.zh: 我 做 了 什么 ？   肯定 不是 免除 了 他们 的 债务

translation.en: As your predecessor said,
translation.zh: 正如 你 前任 所 说 ：

translation.en: you are showing me what will happen if I do not change.
translation.zh: 你 要 让 我 看看   如果 不 做出 改变 会 是 什么 下场

translation.en: I did not change, yet I am celebrated.
translation.zh: 我 没有 改变   但 人们 为 我 歌功颂德

translation.en: And rightly so.
translation.zh: 就 该 这样

translation.en: These creatures have finally come to their senses. That's it. Ha!
translation.zh: 这些 家伙 终于 想 明白 了   这就 对 了

translation.en: It would seem the ordeal to which I have been subjected
translation.zh: 看来 我 所 受 的 折磨

translation.en: has been a complete waste of my time. And yours, my silent friend.
translation.zh: 完全 是 浪费 时间   至于 你   我 安静 的 朋友

translation.en: No matter. All's well that ends well, as they say.
translation.zh: 没关系   常 言道   结局 好   样样 都 好

translation.en: [woman] ♪ For he's a jolly good fellow ♪
translation.zh: 他 是 一个 快乐 的 大好人

translation.en: That's right, Prudence. They're cheering for me.
translation.zh: 没错   普鲁登斯   他们 在 为 我 欢呼

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: ♪ For I'm a jolly good fellow ♪
translation.zh: 我 是 一个 快乐 的 大好人

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们

translation.en: ♪ On behalf of all the people Who have gathered here today ♪
translation.zh: 在 此 代表 今天 聚集 在 这里 的 各位

translation.en: ♪ I would merely like to mention If I may ♪
translation.zh: 我 只 想 说   恕 我 冒昧

translation.en: [Tom] ♪ That our unanimous attitude ♪
translation.zh: 我们 大家 态度 一致

translation.en: ♪ Is one of lasting gratitude ♪ ♪ For what our friend Has done for us today ♪
translation.zh: 我们 将 感激 永世   多亏 了 这位 朋友 今日 的 恩惠

translation.en: ♪ And therefore ♪
translation.zh: 所以

translation.en: ♪ I would simply like to say ♪
translation.zh: 我 只有 一 言 以 对

translation.en: ♪ Thank you very much Thank you very much ♪
translation.zh: 非常 感谢 你   非常 感谢 你

translation.en: ♪ That's the nicest thing That anyone's ever done for me ♪
translation.zh: 从未 有人 对 我 这么 好

translation.en: ♪ I may sound double Dutch But my delight is such ♪
translation.zh: 也许 我 像是 胡言乱语   但 我 是 真的 满心 欢喜

translation.en: ♪ I feel as if A losing war's been won for me ♪
translation.zh: 就 像 反败 为 胜是 有人 代劳

translation.en: ♪ And if I had a flag I'd hang me flag out ♪
translation.zh: 我 若 有 面旗 帜   一定 把 它 挂 得 高高

translation.en: ♪ To add a sort of final victory touch ♪
translation.zh: 只 为 彰显 最终 的 胜利

translation.en: ♪ But since I've left my flag at home I'll simply have to say ♪
translation.zh: 但 既然 旗帜 放在 家   我 就 只 说 一 句

translation.en: ♪ Thank you very, very, very much ♪
translation.zh: 真是 非常 非常 感谢 你

translation.en: ♪ Thank you very, very, very much ♪
translation.zh: 真是 非常 非常 感谢 你

translation.en: ♪ Thank you very much Thank you very much ♪
translation.zh: 非常 感谢 你   非常 感谢 你

translation.en: ♪ That's the nicest thing That anyone's ever done for me ♪
translation.zh: 从未 有人 对 我 这么 好

translation.en: ♪ It isn't every day Good fortune comes your way ♪
translation.zh: 并不 是 每 一 天   你 都会 好运 连连

translation.en: ♪ I never thought The future would be fun for me ♪
translation.zh: 我 从未 想 过   未来 可以 欢乐 逍遥

translation.en: ♪ And if I had a bugle, I would blow it ♪
translation.zh: 手上 若 有 把 军号   我 一定 吹 得 震天 响

translation.en: ♪ To add a sort of How's-your-father touch ♪
translation.zh: 也好 转移 话题

translation.en: ♪ But since I left me bugle at home I'll simply have to say ♪
translation.zh: 但 既然 军号 放在 家   我 就 只 说 一 句

translation.en: ♪ Thank you very, very, very Very, very, very, very, very, very much ♪
translation.zh: 真是 非常 非常 感谢 你

translation.en: -[all] ♪ For he's a jolly good fellow ♪ -♪ For who's a jolly good fellow? ♪
translation.zh: - 他 是 快乐 的 大好人   - 谁 是 快乐 的 大好人 ？

translation.en: [all] ♪ He's a jolly good fellow ♪
translation.zh: 他 是 快乐 的 大好人

translation.en: ♪ And so say all of us ♪
translation.zh: 大家 都 这么 说 你

translation.en: ♪ [Tom] And if I had a drum I'd have to bang it ♪
translation.zh: 我 要是 有 面鼓   肯定 会 使劲 敲

translation.en: ♪ To add a sort of rumpty-tumpty touch ♪
translation.zh: 增加 点 欢乐 创意

translation.en: ♪ But since I left my drum at home I'll simply have to say ♪
translation.zh: 但 既然 大 鼓放 在家   我 就 只 说 一 句

translation.en: ♪ Thank you very, very, very ♪
translation.zh: 真是 非常 非常

translation.en: -♪ Much ♪ -[all] ♪ For he's a jolly good fellow ♪
translation.zh: - 感谢 你   - 他 是 快乐 的 大好人

translation.en: Thank you very much!
translation.zh: 非常 感谢 你

translation.en: Ha, ha! Oh, yes, indeed.
translation.zh: 没错   这才 像话

translation.en: This is far more agreeable than what your predecessors had me endure.
translation.zh: 这 比 你 的 前任 让 我 忍受 的 东西 好多 了

translation.en: So what's next, friend?
translation.zh: 那 接下来 呢   朋友 ？

translation.en: Tiny Tim.
translation.zh: 小蒂姆

translation.en: -No. -It's all right.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Cratchit, times are hard, and my financial burdens are considerable.
translation.zh: 克拉奇   世道 艰难   我 的 担子 也 不 轻

translation.en: -[Bob] My boy needs medicine. -[Cratchit Sr.] It's Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 先生   今天 是 平安夜 啊

translation.en: -[Bob] My boy needs medicine. -[Cratchit Sr.] It's Christmas Eve. [Scrooge] Cratchit, you do nothing but trouble me.
translation.zh: 克拉奇 … 你 就 知道 麻烦 我

translation.en: Should I add to them by paying for the upkeep of your entire family?
translation.zh: 难道 为了 让 你 家好 过   我 要 自己 多 吃苦 ？

translation.en: I must go now, my little man.
translation.zh: 我 得 走 了   小家伙

translation.en: I promised your mother I'd help with Christmas dinner, but…
translation.zh: 我 答应 帮 你 妈妈 准备 圣诞 晚餐   但 …

translation.en: I'll come and see you again tomorrow. Same time, all right?
translation.zh: 我 明天 会 来看 你 的   还是 这个 时间   好 吗 ？

translation.en: [sobs] Oh, dear Tim.
translation.zh: 哦   亲爱 的 蒂姆

translation.en: -[Bob cries] -Come on now, Father.
translation.zh: 走 吧   爸爸

translation.en: Till tomorrow then. Sleep well, my love. Sweet dreams.
translation.zh: 明天 见   好好 睡 吧   亲爱 的   晚安 好 梦

translation.en: I…
translation.zh: 我 …

translation.en: I could have done more.
translation.zh: 我 本 可以 多 出些力 的

translation.en: I could have done something.
translation.zh: 我 本该 做 点 什么的

translation.en: Poor Tiny Tim.
translation.zh: 可怜 的 小蒂姆

translation.en: Friend, you have shown me a Christmas yet to come
translation.zh: 朋友   你 让 我 看到 了 一个

translation.en: that mixes great joy with greater sorrow.
translation.zh: 喜忧参半 的 圣诞

translation.en: Tell me, is this what will be,
translation.zh: 告诉 我   这是 注定 的 未来

translation.en: or what may be?
translation.zh: 还是 只是 一 种 可能 ？

translation.en: If I were to change,
translation.zh: 如果 我 做出 改变

translation.en: would all this still come to pass?
translation.zh: 这一切 还 会 发生 吗 ？

translation.en: [man] Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: -[Tom laughs] -Gentlemen, please. Sorry, Father. But you reap what you sow.
translation.zh: - 先生们   拜托   - 抱歉   神父   但 种瓜得瓜   种豆得豆

translation.en: Is that not what your Good Book says?
translation.zh: 《 圣经 》 里 不 就是 这么 说 的 吗 ？

translation.en: I wouldn't hang about for any mourners. Nobody's sorry to see this one go.
translation.zh: 还是 别 等 什么 人 来 致哀 了   这位 走 了   没 人 会 伤心 的

translation.en: Nobody who doesn't walk on all fours anyway.
translation.zh: 至少 两 条 腿 走路 的 不 会

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
translation.zh: 圣诞 快乐

translation.en: And thank you very much. [laughs]
translation.zh: 另外   非常 感谢 你

translation.en: [Tom sighs happily] Come on. Earth to earth, ashes to ashes, dust to dust.
translation.zh: 来 吧   尘归 尘   土归土

translation.en: [Jacob] Scrooge…
translation.zh: 斯克鲁奇 …

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Spare me.
translation.zh: 放过 我 吧

translation.en: Let me return.
translation.zh: 让 我 回去

translation.en: I will not become this man
translation.zh: 我 不要 变成 这个 人

translation.en: whose death is the cause of such celebration.
translation.zh: 死 了 倒 让 众人 欢喜

translation.en: Why show me this if I am past all hope?
translation.zh: 如果 希望 全 无   干嘛 还要 让 我 看 这个 ？

translation.en: Am I? Truly?
translation.zh: 我 没 希望 了 ？ 真的 ？

translation.en: If… If I am beyond salvation, then so be it.
translation.zh: 如果 我 真的 无可救药   那 我 认 了

translation.en: But, please, the boy need not die.
translation.zh: 但 求 你 了   那 孩子 本 不 该死

translation.en: Not when I have it in my power to help him.
translation.zh: 我 有 能力 帮助 他

translation.en: I beg of you, spare me for this reason, if nothing more.
translation.zh: 我 求 你 了   哪怕 就 为 这个 原因   你 就 放过 我 吧

translation.en: I swear to honor Christmas in my heart and keep it there the whole year through.
translation.zh: 我 发誓   会 在心 中   铭记 圣诞 的 教训   全年 不 忘

translation.en: I will learn from the past, live only in the present,
translation.zh: 我 会 吸取 过去 的 教训   活 在 当下

translation.en: and strive for a better future.
translation.zh: 努力 活出 更 好的 未来

translation.en: For all!
translation.zh: 为了 所有人

translation.en: Tell me I may yet strike the writing from the boy's cross.
translation.zh: 告诉 我   我 仍 能 改写 那 孩子 的 命运

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求 你 了

translation.en: Please, tell me!
translation.zh: 求求 你 告诉 我 ！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不 ！

translation.en: [Scrooge] No!
translation.zh: 不 ！

translation.en: [Jen] ♪ The wish that you wish On Christmas Day… ♪
translation.zh: 人们 说   在 圣诞节 许下 的 心愿 …

translation.en: [Isabel] ♪ Goodbye… ♪
translation.zh: 再见 …

translation.en: [Tim] ♪ On the beautiful day That I dream… ♪
translation.zh: 在 我 梦 中 那 美好 的 一日 …

translation.en: [Scrooge] No! No! Please, no! No! Please, no!
translation.zh: 不 ！ 求 你 了   不要 啊 ！

translation.en: [Scrooge] No! No!
translation.zh: 不 ！

translation.en: Spare me! Spare me!
translation.zh: 放过 我 ！

translation.en: Please. Please!
translation.zh: 求 你 了

translation.en: [Scrooge] Prudence?
translation.zh: 普鲁登斯 ？

translation.en: Prudence!
translation.zh: 普鲁登斯 ！

translation.en: [gasps] I'm in my bedroom.
translation.zh: 我 在 自家 卧室

translation.en: Oh, it's Prudence.
translation.zh: 是 普鲁登斯

translation.en: Well, was I… Was I merely dreaming?
translation.zh: 我 只是 做梦 而已 吗 ？

translation.en: -You there! -[man] Huh?
translation.zh: - 说 你 呢 ！   - 嗯 ？

translation.en: I-I say, what day is it, my fine fellow?
translation.zh: 请问 这位 好心人   今天 什么 日子 ？

translation.en: Um, Tuesday, I think.
translation.zh: 星期二 吧

translation.en: Ha, no.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: Is it Christmas Day?
translation.zh: 今天 是 圣诞节 吗 ？

translation.en: Well, of course it is.
translation.zh: 当然 了

translation.en: [grunts] Takes all kinds, I suppose.
translation.zh: 还 真是 什么 人 都 有

translation.en: It's Christmas, Prudence! [laughs]
translation.zh: 今天 是 圣诞节   普鲁登斯

translation.en: -[Prudence barks] -It's Christmas, and I'm alive! [laughs]
translation.zh: 今天 是 圣诞节   我 还 活 着 ！

translation.en: Wait, what time is it?
translation.zh: 等等   现在 几点 了 ？

translation.en: I'm glad Isabel found the happiness she deserved.
translation.zh: 还 好 伊莎贝尔 找到 了 她 应有 的 幸福

translation.en: Perhaps…
translation.zh: 也许 …

translation.en: Perhaps it's not too late for me to find my own.
translation.zh: 也许 我 还 来得及 找到 属于 我 的 幸福

translation.en: -[sighs contentedly] -I did. I swear. I said-- -Hello there. -[girl] What?
translation.zh: - 我 说 了   我 发誓   我 说 …   - 你们 好

translation.en: What is it? We didn't do nothing, Mr. Scrooge.
translation.zh: 怎么 了 ？   我们 什么 都 没 干   斯克鲁奇 先生

translation.en: No, not yet, you haven't. [laughs]
translation.zh: 没错   是 还 没有

translation.en: I have some errands for you to run. I can make it worth your while.
translation.zh: 我 有些 差事 要 你们 办   还 会 好好 犒劳 你们

translation.en: Errands?
translation.zh: 差事 ？

translation.en: Thank you, Prudence. There's a good girl. [boy 1] Ah, ah, ah, ahh!
translation.zh: 谢谢 你   普鲁登斯   真是 好 姑娘

translation.en: Mind how you go.
translation.zh: 小心 哦

translation.en: [girl] Mr. Scrooge, sir.
translation.zh: 斯克鲁奇 先生

translation.en: Almost done.
translation.zh: 就 快 好 了

translation.en: Magnificent. What wonderful children you all are.
translation.zh: 太 棒 了   你们 真是 好 孩子

translation.en: And, well, sorry to ask again,
translation.zh: 抱歉 再 问 一 次

translation.en: but you're sure you managed to get everything on the list?
translation.zh: 你 确定 单子 上 的 东西 都 备齐 了 ？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的   先生

translation.en: The butchers and the bakers thought I was having a laugh.
translation.zh: 屠夫 和 面包师 都 以为 我 是 闹着玩 呢

translation.en: But then I gave 'em the checks. They'll be here soon.
translation.zh: 但 我 把 支票 给 他们 了   这些 人 很快 就 会 到 的

translation.en: Splendid. And you did deliver the invitations? All of them?
translation.zh: 太 好 了   邀请函 也 都 送到 了   对 吧 ？

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然 了

translation.en: No guarantee they'll come, though. It is very short notice.
translation.zh: 但 不 能 保证 他们 会 来   这 可是 临时 通知

translation.en: [laughs] Quite. Uh, you are a clever young lady, aren't you?
translation.zh: 的确   你 真是 聪明 的 姑娘   是 不是 ？

translation.en: As promised, a gold sovereign for each of you.
translation.zh: 说话 算话   每人 一个 金币

translation.en: Boys, since it's Christmas, I ain't even gonna take my cut.
translation.zh: 小子们   既然 今天 是 圣诞   我 自己 就 不 分成 了

translation.en: That's the spirit. And you'll all stay for dinner, won't you?
translation.zh: 这就 对 了   大家 都会 留下 用餐 吧 ？

translation.en: Won't you?
translation.zh: 对 吧 ？

translation.en: -[all] Yay! -[barking]
translation.zh: 耶 ！

translation.en: Ha! And help yourself to a gift.
translation.zh: 还 能 自己 选 礼物

translation.en: [children] Yay!
translation.zh: 耶 ！

translation.en: -[boy 1] Come on. -[boy 2] I get the biggest one.
translation.zh: - 来 吧 …   - 我 要 最 大 的

translation.en: Ready, Prudence?
translation.zh: 准备 好 了 吗   普鲁登斯 ？

translation.en: ♪ I'll begin again ♪
translation.zh: 我 会 重新 开始

translation.en: ♪ I will build my life ♪
translation.zh: 我 会 创造 属于 我 的 生活

translation.en: ♪ I will live to know ♪
translation.zh: 我 要 让 自己 知道

translation.en: ♪ That I've fulfilled my life ♪
translation.zh: 我 度过 了 充实 的 人生

translation.en: ♪ I'll begin today ♪
translation.zh: 我 今天 就 开始

translation.en: ♪ Throw away the past ♪
translation.zh: 丢掉 过去

translation.en: ♪ And the future I build ♪
translation.zh: 而 我 创造 的 未来

translation.en: ♪ Will be something ♪
translation.zh: 将 会

translation.en: ♪ That will last ♪
translation.zh: 长久 延续

translation.en: -There we go. Comfortable enough, Ethel? -Yes. Much obliged, Mr. Scrooge.
translation.zh: - 好 了   够 舒适 吗   埃塞尔 ？   - 是的   非常 感谢   斯克鲁奇 先生

translation.en: Good, good, good. Oh, and please, call me Ebenezer.
translation.zh: 很 好   对 了   请 叫 我 埃比尼泽

translation.en: -What's all this about then? -Tom, your debt is canceled.
translation.zh: - 这是 怎么 回 事 ？   - 汤姆   你 的 债务 已经 免除

translation.en: Merry Christmas, my friend.
translation.zh: 圣诞 快乐   我 的 朋友

translation.en: Oh, and give my best to your mother, won't you?
translation.zh: 对 了   帮 我 问候 你 妈妈   好 吗 ？

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 谢谢   非常 感谢 您

translation.en: [both] Oh, my giddy aunt!
translation.zh: - 哎呀   老天爷 ！   - 哎呀   老天爷 ！

translation.en: Ladies, 1,000 pounds for your fund, this and every Christmas to come.
translation.zh: 女士们   从 今年 开始   每年 圣诞   为 你们 捐款 1000 英镑

translation.en: [both] Oh, such generosity.
translation.zh: - 真是 太 慷慨 了   - 真是 太 慷慨 了

translation.en: It's the doll from my mother's picture. Uncle, I can't accept this.
translation.zh: 是 我 妈妈 照片 里 的 娃娃   舅舅   我 不 能 收

translation.en: You must.
translation.zh: 你 必须 收下

translation.en: It's a gift from an old fool who regrets all the Christmases we never shared.
translation.zh: 就 当是 我 这个 老 糊涂   表达 没 能 与 你们 共度 圣诞 的 悔意 吧

translation.en: [Harry] Oh, Uncle.
translation.zh: 哦   舅舅

translation.en: [laughs] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 您

translation.en: -"Business partners"? -Yes, Bob. If you'll have me, that is.
translation.zh: - “ 生意 伙伴 ” ？   - 是的   鲍勃   只要 你 愿意

translation.en: Let's build a brighter future for the Cratchits together.
translation.zh: 我们 一起 为 克拉奇家   创造 更加 美好 的 未来

translation.en: -What do you say? -[Bob] I say yes!
translation.zh: - 你 怎么 说 ？   - 我 同意 ！

translation.en: God bless you, Mr. Scrooge.
translation.zh: 上帝 保佑 您   斯克鲁奇 先生

translation.en: ♪ I will start anew ♪
translation.zh: 我 会 重新 开始

translation.en: ♪ I will make amends ♪
translation.zh: 我 会 努力 补偿

translation.en: ♪ And I'll make quite certain That the story ends ♪
translation.zh: 我 一定 会 让 故事 的 结局

translation.en: ♪ On a note of hope, on a strong amen ♪
translation.zh: 充满 希望   曲调 高昂

translation.en: ♪ And I'll thank the world And remember when ♪
translation.zh: 我 会 感谢 世界   铭记 当初

translation.en: ♪ I was able to ♪
translation.zh: 让 我 得以

translation.en: ♪ Begin ♪
translation.zh: 重新 开始

translation.en: or Coal Creek, West Virginia were, they probably couldn't point 'em out to you on a map.
translation.zh: 或者 西弗吉尼亚州 的 煤溪镇 在 哪里

translation.en: they probably couldn't point 'em out to you on a map.
translation.zh: 他们 或许 没 办法 在 地图 上 指 出来

translation.en: But I guarantee, they'd be there all the same.
translation.zh: 但 我 向 你 保证   这 两 个 地方 确实 存在

translation.en: How and why so many people from those two piddlin' places on that map
translation.zh: 地图 上 这 两 个 不起眼 的 地方   有 那么 多 人 与 彼此 扯上 了 关系

translation.en: could end up connected has a lot to do with our story.
translation.zh: 背后 的 原因 与 我们 的 故事 息息相关

translation.en: Some would claim it was just dumb luck,
translation.zh: 有些 人 会 说 那 纯粹 是 运气

translation.en: while others might swear it was God's intention.
translation.zh: 而 其他人 则 会 说 那 是 上帝 的 旨意

translation.en: But I'd say with the way things turned out,
translation.zh: 但 从 事情 的 结局 来看

translation.en: it was a little bit of both.
translation.zh: 我 说 两者 都 沾点儿 边

translation.en: In 1957, it'd take someone approximately ten hours
translation.zh: 在 1957年   从 煤溪镇 开车 到 俄亥俄州 南部

translation.en: to drive from Coal Creek to a paper mill town
translation.zh: 一个 名 为 米德 的 造纸 小 镇

translation.en: in southern Ohio called Meade.
translation.zh: 大约 需要 十 个 小时

translation.en: Once you got to Meade, Knockemstiff was only a short drive away.
translation.zh: 一旦 到 了 米德镇   诺肯史 提镇 就 在 不远处

translation.en: Four hundred or so people lived in Knockemstiff in 1957,
translation.zh: 在 1957年   诺肯史 提镇 居住 着 大约 400 人

translation.en: nearly all of them connected by blood by one godforsaken calamity or another,
translation.zh: 几乎 所有人 都 因为 某种 天杀 的 悲剧   而 有着 血缘 关系

translation.en: be it lust or necessity or just plain ignorance.
translation.zh: 不是 淫欲   就是 出于 必要   不然 就是 纯粹 的 无知

translation.en: The Russells had rented the house on top of the Mitchell flats for nine years now.
translation.zh: 罗素 一家 在 米切尔平地 的 山顶 上   已经 租 了 长 达 九 年 的 房子

translation.en: But most of the neighbors down below still considered them outsiders.
translation.zh: 但 底下 的 大多数 邻居   依然 将 他们 当作 外人

translation.en: [boy] Hey, Dad.
translation.zh: 嗨   爸

translation.en: [man] You're coming with me today, boy.
translation.zh: 儿子   今天 跟 我 一起 到 后面 去

translation.en: [narrator] Years ago, Willard had fitted together a weathered cross above a fallen tree
translation.zh: 多年 前   威拉德   在 房子 后面 的 一 小 块 空地 里

translation.en: a weathered cross above a fallen tree in a small clearing behind his house.
translation.zh: 那 颗 倒下 的 树上   立 了 一个 历经 风吹雨打 的 十字架

translation.en: He came every morning and evening to talk to God.
translation.zh: 他 每天 早晚 都会 过来 和 上帝 对话

translation.en: It seemed to his son that his father fought the Devil all the time.
translation.zh: 在 他 儿子 眼里   父亲 一直 在 与 魔鬼 搏斗

translation.en: [Willard] Now, you pray on...
translation.zh: 来   告诉 上帝

translation.en: what happened today.
translation.zh: 今天 所 发生 的 事

translation.en: Now, remember, be honest.
translation.zh: 记得 要 说 实话

translation.en: No bullshittin', he'll know.
translation.zh: 不准 胡扯   上帝 知道 的

translation.en: [narrator] When he prayed,
translation.zh: 在 祈祷 的 时候

translation.en: his mind would often drift back to the war in the South Pacific
translation.zh: 他 的 思绪 常常 会   飘回 到 那场 南 太平洋 战争

translation.en: and the day that he and a couple of other soldiers came across the body
translation.zh: 以及 他 和 其他 几 名 士兵 一起 发现

translation.en: and the day that he and a couple of other soldiers came across the body of Gunnery Sergeant Miller Jones.

translation.en: [Willard] Holy shit.
translation.zh: 见鬼 了

translation.en: [man] What's it say?

translation.en: Miller Jones.
translation.zh: 米勒琼斯

translation.en: -[man] Fuck! -[Miller gasping]

translation.en: [man] We gotta do something. The Japs just left him up there.

translation.en: [bus driver] Next stop, Meade, Ohio.
translation.zh: 下 一 站   俄亥俄州   米德镇

translation.en: -Please. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 你 坐 吧   谢谢

translation.en: [narrator] Right before Willard fell in love,
translation.zh: 在 威拉德 坠入 爱河 之前

translation.en: the man whose seat he took would also meet his match.
translation.zh: 给 他 让座 的 男人   也 将 会 遇到 他 的 真命 天女

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I forgot my damn keys.
translation.zh: - 很 抱歉   我 忘 了 拿 钥匙   - 没关系

translation.en: Okay. Guy by the window counter.
translation.zh: 坐 在 窗边 吧 台 的 男人

translation.en: So, what'll you be having?

translation.en: Ham and cheese.
translation.zh: 火腿 芝士 三明治

translation.en: [whispers] Ham and cheese.
translation.zh: 火腿 芝士 三明治

translation.en: -Okay. -You're a little green on the job.
translation.zh: - 好   - 你 还是 新手 吧

translation.en: -That obvious, huh? -[man chuckles]

translation.en: My brother just got me the job, so...
translation.zh: 是 我 哥刚 帮 我 找到 的 新 工作   所以 …

translation.en: Ham and cheese.
translation.zh: 火腿 芝士 三明治

translation.en: You take pictures?

translation.en: [narrator] In the years to come, Carl would call Sandy "the bait,"

translation.en: and she'd called him "the shooter."
translation.zh: 而 她 则 会 称 他 为 摄手

translation.en: Only when I find a smile pretty enough to photograph, that is.
translation.zh: 只有 在 我 找到 值得 一 拍 的 笑容 时 才 拍

translation.en: [narrator] Both called their victims "the models."

translation.en: I'll have to think about it.
translation.zh: 我 得 考虑 一下

translation.en: -[door chimes open] -[waitress] What can I get ya?

translation.en: Meatloaf is the blue plate special.

translation.en: Um--Just coffee and a doughnut.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[door chimes open]

translation.en: -Looks really fine. -[manager] No!

translation.en: No!

translation.en: -Get out. I told you last time. -Come on, now.

translation.en: [manager] Next time, the cops will drag you out.

translation.en: -[waitress] Excuse me. -Get out!

translation.en: I'm just gonna take my break outside.
translation.zh: 我 去 外面 休息 一下

translation.en: [homeless man] All right.
translation.zh: 好 啦

translation.en: -All right! -[door clanks shut]

translation.en: [man] Thank you. God bless you.

translation.en: Did you need anything else?

translation.en: Um... No, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 不 需要

translation.en: That was nice, what you did.

translation.en: Some people just need a little help once in a while.

translation.en: You know what I mean?

translation.en: Yep.

translation.en: -Hmm. -You back home from the war?

translation.en: Nah, I'm just passing through.

translation.en: On my way to West Virginia.

translation.en: My people are from Coal Creek.

translation.en: That's too bad.

translation.en: You have a nice face.

translation.en: Well... [exhales]

translation.en: It's nice to meet you.

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, too.

translation.en: -[Willard] Where'd you hear that? -Read it in the paper.

translation.en: -[sighs] Lord, that's good stuff. -Mm-hmm.

translation.en: -I got three more in my kit. -Yeah?

translation.en: Yep. And I've got something else for you, Uncle Earskell.

translation.en: that Hitler used to blow his brains out.

translation.en: [scoffs] You still got the bullshit in you, ain't you?

translation.en: -You think that guy lied to me? -[chuckles] Yeah.

translation.en: That is a nice gift, though.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Thank you.

translation.en: It's German.

translation.en: [woman crying] Oh, come here! Oh...

translation.en: [sighs] Oh, Lord, I was so worried.

translation.en: It wasn't that bad.

translation.en: It wasn't that bad, Mama.

translation.en: I would ask you to get down and thank Jesus with me,

translation.en: but I can smell the liquor on your breath.

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: I felt the need to celebrate.

translation.en: I'm in love.

translation.en: -What's this girl's name? -[Earskell clears throat]

translation.en: Well, I ain't never got her name.

translation.en: -[Earskell laughs] -Earskell.

translation.en: You ain't got her name?

translation.en: I left her a dollar tip, though.

translation.en: [Earskell] Well, she won't forget that.

translation.en: a girl from church I want you to meet.

translation.en: -I don't wanna go to church, Mama. -[shushing]

translation.en: You get some rest. [grunts] You'll feel better in the morning.

translation.en: [narrator] Though he couldn't look at a cross without thinking of Miller Jones,

translation.en: he never told anyone about the crucified Marine.
translation.zh: 但 他 从没 跟 任何 人 提 过   那位 被 钉 在 十字架 上 的 海军

translation.en: -[man] Welcome. -[woman] Willard.

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -[Willard] Hi, how are you?

translation.en: Willard just got back, Helen.

translation.en: -You-- -Welcome home.

translation.en: It's been four days.

translation.en: [narrator] Willard didn't know that Emma had promised God

translation.en: that in exchange for bringing him home safe,

translation.en: she'd make sure he married Helen Hatton.

translation.en: The girl's family burned up in a house fire

translation.en: leaving the poor thing all alone.

translation.en: [pastor] Good gracious.

translation.en: It's hot, ain't it? -[crowd] Amen. -It's bound to get hotter.

translation.en: -[crowd] Amen. -It's bound to get hotter.

translation.zh: 现在   两 位 来自 托普维尔 的 孩子

translation.en: -gonna lead the service today. -[man] All right.

translation.en: And from what folks tell me, they got a right good message.
translation.zh: 我 听说 他们 要 传达 一个 很 棒 的 信息

translation.en: So, let's bring 'em up. Boys, come on up here.
translation.zh: 所以 就 请 他们 上来 吧   孩子们   上来 吧

translation.en: -Let's make 'em feel welcome. -[woman] Oh!

translation.en: [man] Welcome, boys. Welcome.

translation.en: See that one in the wheelchair?

translation.en: Drank too much strychnine or antifreeze, or something is why he can't walk.

translation.en: So good to see you. Thank you for coming.
translation.zh: 很 高兴 见到 你   感谢 前来

translation.en: Testing their fate, they call it.
translation.zh: 他们 说 那 是 在 考验 他们 的 信仰

translation.en: It's going too far, the way I see it.

translation.en: Thank you, Reverend.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你   牧师

translation.en: My name is Roy Laferty,
translation.zh: 我 是 罗伊 拉费 蒂

translation.en: and this here is my cousin, Theodore.
translation.zh: 这是 我 的 表弟   西奥 多

translation.en: Now, the Holy Ghost is going to visit this little church
translation.zh: 现在   圣灵 将 会 降临

translation.en: that bears his sacred name!

translation.en: ♪ Are you washed ♪ ♪ In the blood ♪

translation.en: [Roy] Come on, Theodore!

translation.en: [Roy] What is it you're most afraid of?

translation.en: Because if your worst fear is rats, well..

translation.en: Satan'll make sure you get your fill of them. Mm.
translation.zh: 撒旦 会 确保 有够 你 受 的

translation.en: -[man] That's right, tell 'em, boy. -Brothers and sisters...
translation.zh: 没错   说 得 好   兄弟 姐妹们

translation.en: you'll see them,
translation.zh: 你 会 眼睁睁 地 看 着

translation.en: eating away at you whilst you lay there
translation.zh: 它们 慢慢 地 将 你 吞噬

translation.en: unable to lift a single finger.
translation.zh: 而 你 却 躺 在 那里 动弹 不得

translation.en: And it won't ever cease.
translation.zh: 而且 这 永远 不 会 停止

translation.en: A million years in eternity.

translation.en: Now, don't even try and figure that up.
translation.zh: 别费劲 计算 了

translation.en: [man] Come on, Lord.

translation.en: -[crowd murmurs] -[chuckles] Yeah?

translation.en: And really, brothers and sisters, ain't no man ever been evil enough,

translation.en: -not even that Hitler fella... -That's right.

translation.en: ...come up with the ways Satan's gonna make them sinners pay

translation.en: -come the Judgment Day! -[crowd] Yeah!

translation.en: Yeah! Yes, that's right, my friends!

translation.en: Yeah! Yes, that's right, my friends! [woman] Yes, sir! Praise the Lord!

translation.en: Amen.
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: Let me tell you something, friends.

translation.en: Before I found the Holy Ghost...

translation.en: I was scared plumb to death of spiders.

translation.en: -Ain't that right, Theodore? -Mm-hmm.

translation.en: [Roy] I was a runt,

translation.en: hiding under my mother's long skirts,

translation.en: spiders crawling through my dreams...

translation.en: ...laying eggs in my nightmares.

translation.en: They was...

translation.en: hang in their webs everywhere...

translation.en: waitin'.
translation.zh: 等待 着

translation.en: I had fear in me all the time, awake or asleep, didn't matter.

translation.en: Now, that's what hell is like, brothers and sisters!

translation.en: [woman] Praise the Lord.
translation.zh: - 赞美 主   - 没错

translation.en: [Roy] I got no rest from them devils!
translation.zh: 我 没日没夜 地 被 魔鬼 折磨 着

translation.en: [crowd] Amen!
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: Not until the Lord gave me strength!

translation.en: [crowd] Amen!
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: Brothers and sisters... [woman] Whoo!

translation.en: ...behold!
translation.zh: 看好 了 ！

translation.en: The Lord looks out for me now!

translation.en: [man] Amen!
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: Mark my word, people!

translation.en: The Spirit will take away your fears if you're willing!

translation.en: [Willard] Them spiders, sure was a nice touch.

translation.en: I ain't gonna sleep tonight as it is.

translation.en: I wish Helen left with us.

translation.en: Well, she might have come with us,

translation.en: if you'd paid her a little more attention.
translation.zh: 说不定 她 会 跟 我们 走

translation.en: The right man would make a good life for Helen.

translation.en: [narrator] Emma was concerned something bad might happen
translation.zh: 艾玛 担心 实现 不 了 对 上帝 的 承诺

translation.en: if she couldn't keep her promise to God.

translation.en: Helen did, in fact, meet the man she would marry that afternoon.

translation.en: Bless me, Reverend.
translation.zh: 赐福于 我   牧师

translation.en: Bless me.
translation.zh: 赐福于 我

translation.en: And Willard's mind was already hundreds of miles away. ♪ Will the arrow point my way ♪

translation.en: Be right there.
translation.zh: 马上 来

translation.en: I ain't no rush.
translation.zh: 不 急

translation.en: -Why, if it isn't-- -I never got your name.
translation.zh: - 这不 是 …   - 我 还 不 知道 你 的 名字

translation.en: [manager] Charlotte, second call on chicken over peas.

translation.en: Be right back with you, hon.

translation.en: [man] See, full-time, I'm a lawyer.

translation.en: -Real estate isn't my business, but... -[dog barking]

translation.en: I own a few of these properties around Meade, Knockemstiff.
translation.zh: 我 在 诺肯史 提镇 和 米德镇   拥有 几 套 房子

translation.en: Real long-term investments.
translation.zh: 作为 长期 投资

translation.en: There aren't any sinks in here, Mr. Dunlap.
translation.zh: 这里 一个 水槽 都 没有   邓拉普 先生

translation.en: [Dunlap] Ain't no running water, missy. There's a well out back.
translation.zh: 没 自来水 呢   小姐   房子 后面 有 口 井

translation.en: What do you think, Arvin?
translation.zh: 你 觉得 呢   亚文 ？

translation.en: [narrator] Though he hadn't talked to God in years,
translation.zh: 自从 发现   那位 被 钉 在 十字架 上 的 海军 后

translation.en: not a single petition or word of praise

translation.en: since he'd come across the crucified Marine.

translation.en: Willard could feel it welling up inside him now,
translation.zh: 但 威拉德 现在 心中 涌起 了 一 股 冲动

translation.en: the urge to get right with his maker

translation.en: before something bad happened to his family.

translation.en: [woman] ♪ Just before the children came ♪
translation.zh: 孩子们 到来 之前

translation.en: ♪ And my room was very quiet ♪

translation.en: ♪ I heard someone call my name ♪
translation.zh: 我 听见 有人 呼唤 我 的 名字

translation.en: ♪ Saying, "Come up here My little Bessie" ♪
translation.zh: 他 说   上来 吧   我 的 小 贝希

translation.en: Where'd you go?

translation.en: I was just looking the land over.
translation.zh: 只是 去 把 地方 都 看 了 一 遍

translation.en: What you think?

translation.en: -It's nice. -[baby cooing]
translation.zh: 很 不错

translation.en: Rent seems fair for what we get.
translation.zh: 租金 也 挺 合理 的

translation.en: We keep saving,
translation.zh: 努力 攒钱 的话

translation.en: we could probably buy it.
translation.zh: 也许 能 把 房子 给 买下

translation.en: Wouldn't that be something? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那 多 棒 啊

translation.en: Arvin have a home of his own.
translation.zh: 亚文 有 个 属于 自己 的 家

translation.en: I never did have that.
translation.zh: 我 可 不曾 有 过

translation.en: [Willard] Things are good, Mama.
translation.zh: 一切 都 很 好   妈

translation.en: We found a place in a holler called Knockemstiff.

translation.en: [man] Let's move! [Willard] Arvin just turned one, and he has lots of grass to play on now.
translation.zh: 亚文 刚 满 一 岁

translation.en: [Willard] Arvin just turned one, and he has lots of grass to play on now.
translation.zh: 现在 有 一大 片 草地 能 让 他 玩耍

translation.en: We're saving money to buy the house one day.
translation.zh: 我们 正 努力 攒钱   准备 有天 把 房子 买 下来

translation.en: So things are gonna be tight for a while.
translation.zh: 所以 手头 会 紧上 一阵子

translation.en: We'll get to you as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 我们 会 尽快 去 看 你 的

translation.en: Your son, Willard.
translation.zh: 你 的 儿子   威拉德
附笔 ：

translation.en: I got the urge to pray again.
translation.zh: 我 又 有 想 祈祷 的 冲动 了

translation.en: "We'll get to you as soon as possible. Your son Willard.
translation.zh: “ 我们 会 尽快 去 看 你 的   你 的 儿子   威拉德

translation.en: P.S. I got the urge to pray again."
translation.zh: 附笔 ： 我 又 有 想 祈祷 的 冲动 了 ”

translation.en: -Sure you don't mind watching Lenora? -[Emma] Sure.
translation.zh: 你 真的 不 介意 替 我 看 着 莱诺拉 吗 ？

translation.en: Don't mind. Hand her over here. Where y'all going?
translation.zh: 当然 不 介意   把 她 交给 我 吧   你们 要 去 哪 ？

translation.en: -We just thought we'd take a ride. -[Emma grunts]
translation.zh: 只是 想 开车 去 兜下 风

translation.en: -Get out of that little house for a bit. -[Emma chuckles]
translation.zh: 离开 家里   出去 透口 气

translation.en: [narrator] Though she didn't know it, she'd never see Lenora again.
translation.zh: 此刻 的 她 还 不 知道   她 再 也 不 会 见到 莱诺 拉 了

translation.en: Seven years later, they found Helen's body buried in the woods.
translation.zh: 七 年后   他们 在 树林 里 挖出 了 海伦 的 尸体

translation.en: I'm thinking we take a walk.

translation.en: Be fine to pray outside and adore them trees.

translation.en: Theodore will be all right sitting in the car.

translation.en: That's right. Don't y'all worry about me.

translation.en: Just be you and me, sweetheart.

translation.en: [narrator] In 1957,
Arvin Eugene Russell was nine years old.
translation.zh: 亚文 尤金 罗素 九 岁 了

translation.en: He was the only kid on the school bus who wasn't somebody's relation.
translation.zh: 他 是 校车 上 唯一 一个   与 其他人 无 血缘 关系 的 孩子

translation.en: Three days before, he'd come home with another black eye.

translation.en: You're coming out back with me today, boy.

translation.en: You got a deposit to make, sir?

translation.en: -[Arvin] C'mere, Jack. -[Willard] Second time.
translation.zh: 已经 是 第二 次 了

translation.en: Those little shits keep picking on him. It ain't right.

translation.en: Them boys might be bigger than you.

translation.en: But the next time one of them starts his shit,

translation.en: I want you to finish it.

translation.en: You understand?

translation.en: Yes, sir.

translation.en: Now, you pray on what happened today.

translation.en: And remember,

translation.en: be honest, no bullshittin'.

translation.en: He'll know.

translation.en: [man] Hell, they having a little revival meetin'.

translation.en: Shit, I'm thinking now'd be a good time to pay his old lady a visit.

translation.en: [Arvin] Dad?

translation.en: This here's the Lord's time, not nobody else's.

translation.en: [man 1] Probably in bed keeping it warm for me.

translation.en: [man 2] Shut the fuck up, Lucas.

translation.en: [Lucas] Wouldn't you take a piece of that?

translation.en: Come on, you dumb son of a bitch. This thing's getting heavy.

translation.en: [narrator] Despite Arvin's fears,

translation.en: the two poachers didn't head to his home that day.

translation.en: ♪ I was trying to be quiet ♪

translation.en: -♪ And to think ♪ -[Arvin humming along] ♪ Of what you said ♪

translation.en: ♪ Just before the lamps were lighted ♪

translation.en: ♪ Just before the children came ♪

translation.en: ♪ When my room was very quiet ♪
translation.zh: 当 我 的 房间 寂静 无比

translation.en: ♪ I heard someone call my name ♪

translation.en: [both] ♪ Saying, "Come up here, my little... ♪ -♪ Arvin ♪ -♪ Bessie ♪

translation.en: -♪ Arvin ♪ -[woman chuckles]

translation.en: -♪ Arvin ♪ -[woman chuckles] [Willard] Arvin, gonna go gas up.

translation.en: No sense in you napping in here like a house cat all day.

translation.en: -Get off the couch, Jack. -Can Jack come?

translation.en: -Come on, Jack. -[Charlotte] Hey.

translation.en: Will you get me some sugar?

translation.en: [Lucas] Motherfucker!

translation.en: -[man] -Oh, shit! Hey, take it easy! -[man 2] He's gonna fuckin' kill him!

translation.en: [man 2] Come on! Get off him!

translation.en: [man] That's enough! You're gonna kill him!

translation.en: [man] Oh, shit!

translation.en: -Stubbs! -Stubbs, get out here, man!
translation.zh: 斯塔布斯   快 过来 ！

translation.en: -Get out of here! -Come on, give me a hand.

translation.en: Get the fuck out of here!

translation.en: Now you remember what I told you?

translation.en: About them boys on the bus that gave you the black eye?

translation.en: That's what I meant.

translation.en: [groans] Just gotta pick the right time.

translation.en: Yes, sir.

translation.en: There's a lot of no good sons of bitches out there.

translation.en: -[breathing heavily] -More than a hundred?

translation.en: Yeah, at least that many.
translation.zh: 嗯   至少 有 那么 多

translation.en: How about I buy you a candy bar, huh?

translation.en: We gotta get some sugar for Mama too.
translation.zh: 我们 也 得 帮 妈 买 点 白糖

translation.en: [Willard] Mm-hmm. [narrator] Arvin would often think back on this day
translation.zh: 亚文 会 经常 回想 起 这 一 天

translation.en: as the best one he ever spent with his father.
translation.zh: 对 他 而言   这是 他 与 父亲 度过 的 最 美好 的 一 天

translation.en: So what kind of candy bar you gonna get, huh?

translation.en: Um... a Charleston Chew, yeah.
translation.zh: 查尔斯顿 牛轧 巧克力 棒

translation.en: Mama?
translation.zh: 妈 ？

translation.en: Mama?
translation.zh: 妈 ？

translation.en: Mama?
translation.zh: 妈 ？

translation.en: -Mama? -[Jack whines, barks]
translation.zh: 妈 ？

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸 ！

translation.en: -[dog whines] -Mama!
translation.zh: 妈 ！

translation.en: [Willard] No! Charlotte!
translation.zh: 不 ！ 夏洛特 ！

translation.en: Listen to me. Charlotte!
translation.zh: 听 我 说话   夏洛特 ！

translation.en: -[Willard] What are you saying? -[man] The test results aren't good.
translation.zh: 你 想 说 什么 ？   检测 结果 并不 理想

translation.en: The morphine will continue to dampen the pain but...

translation.en: there's no way we can destroy that cancer.

translation.en: [Willard] Let's talk downstairs.
translation.zh: 我们 下楼 谈 吧

translation.en: Now... them doctors can't do your mom any good.
translation.zh: 医生们 帮 不 了 你 妈妈

translation.en: But He can save her.
translation.zh: 但 上帝 能 救 她

translation.en: Yeah, if we just pray hard enough.
translation.zh: 对   我们 只 需要 努力 祈祷

translation.en: The Lord can do anything
translation.zh: 上帝 能够 成就 一切

translation.en: -if you just ask him right. -[Jack whining]
translation.zh: 你 只 需要 诚心 祈求

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好 吗 ？

translation.en: Now hold them tight.
translation.zh: 握紧 双手

translation.en: And pray like you mean it.
translation.zh: 发自 内心 地 祈祷

translation.en: Lord,
translation.zh: 上帝

translation.en: please save my wife.
translation.zh: 求求 你 救 我 老婆

translation.en: Destroy this cancer inside her, Lord.
translation.zh: 求求 你 将 她 体内 的 癌症 消灭 掉

translation.en: We need your help, Lord.
translation.zh: 我们 需要 你 的 帮助   上帝

translation.en: We need your help, and I know you can do it.
translation.zh: 我们 需要 你 的 帮助   我 知道 你 能 做到 的

translation.en: I know you can do it.
translation.zh: 我 知道 你 能 做到 的

translation.en: Please Lord, please.
translation.zh: 求求 你 了   上帝   求求 你

translation.en: Pray, God dammit.
translation.zh: 祈祷 啊   该死 的

translation.en: -You want your mama to die? -No, sir.
translation.zh: 你 希望 你 妈 死 吗 ？   不

translation.en: Then pray!
translation.zh: 那 就 快 祈祷 ！

translation.en: Lord, please save my mama!
translation.zh: 上帝   求求 你 救 我 妈妈 ！

translation.en: -Clean the cancer inside of her! -[Willard] We need your help!
translation.zh: 清除 掉 她 体内 的 癌症 ！   我们 需要 你 的 帮助 ！

translation.en: Now you pray, now! You hear me?
translation.zh: 快 祈祷 ！

translation.en: Now you pray, now! You hear me? Yes, Lord!
translation.zh: - 快 祈祷   听到 没 ？   - 是   上帝 ！

translation.en: Save my mama, Lord!
translation.zh: 上帝   求求 你 救 我 妈妈 ！

translation.en: Please clean the cancer inside of her!
translation.zh: 求求 你 清除 掉 她 体内 的 癌症 ！

translation.en: And don't be crying, you hear? Don't be crying!
translation.zh: 还有 不准 哭   听到 没 ？   不 准哭 ！

translation.en: -Pray like you mean it! Lord! -[Jack whining, barking]
translation.zh: 给 我 发自 内心 地 祈祷 ！

translation.en: -Pray like you mean it! Lord! -[Jack whining, barking] Spare my wife!
translation.zh: 上帝   放过 我 老婆 吧

translation.en: [shakily] Don't take her from me.
translation.zh: 别 把 她 从 我 身边 夺走

translation.en: Don't take her from me.
translation.zh: 别 把 她 从 我 身边 夺走

translation.en: [crying] Don't take her from me.
translation.zh: 别 把 她 从 我 身边 夺走

translation.en: Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 一切 都会 没事 的

translation.en: God'll hear us.
translation.zh: 上帝 会 垂听 我们 的 祷告

translation.en: And he'll take care of Mama.
translation.zh: 他 会 保护妈 的

translation.en: You good, honey.
translation.zh: 你 还 好 吧   亲爱 的 ？

translation.en: [woman] We got cozy rooms in the back if you need some company.
translation.zh: 如果 需要 人 陪 的话   后面 有 很 舒服 的 房间

translation.en: I'm fine.
translation.zh: 不用 了

translation.en: [narrator] It occurred to him that maybe something more was expected
translation.zh: 他 突然 想到   也许 上帝 要 的

translation.en: than just his prayers and sincerity.
translation.zh: 不仅 是 祷告 和 诚意

translation.en: God had a tendency of asking men to make sacrifices
translation.zh: 上帝 往往 会 要求 人们 做出 牺牲

translation.en: in order to prove their faith.
translation.zh: 以 证明 自己 的 信仰

translation.en: Dad, no!
translation.zh: 爸   不要 ！

translation.en: Dad, no!
translation.zh: 爸   不要 ！   爸   不要 ！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸 ！

translation.en: Lord, this here is my boy's dog.
translation.zh: 上帝   这是 我 儿子 的 狗
